VI.
about our
ranch
meet Randy & Carol
We are Randy and Carol, visionaries of this magical place called Club Lake. After helping friends create a space for that perfect wedding, we felt the desire and made things happen.
The emotions that have been displayed leave us with the desire to keep this beautiful venue perfect and to be able to continue creating an atmosphere like no other where couples and their guests can come and experience memories being made. We will continue to pay attention to detail, as that is what makes Club Lake uniquely magical.
Our amazing staff will continue to pour their hearts out passionately to make your day the way you dreamt it to be. We strive to maintain this ‘country elegance’ atmosphere in which a couple can come into to share who they are to their beloved guests.


A wedding at Club Lake can only be described as spectacular.  You will be able to create a treasured moment that will last a lifetime.​
OUR MISSION
To provide an atmosphere like no other, and service that allows those who come to actually ‘experience the memories being made’.
Agritourism
WE DO WHAT WE LOVE AND BELIEVE IN
In an era of increasing urbanization, farmers and ranchers are finding people still love the outdoors and the nostalgia of country living. They are turning to agritourism, by hosting weddings and wedding receptions in their barns and in their fields. Couples are opting to marry beneath the majestic oak trees. Beautiful settings nestled among lakes, pine trees and ‘Old Florida’ settings.
EXPLORE
OUR
PACKAGES
view the details

All the details for your
dream wedding
Build your dream wedding package at Club Lake’s unique outdoor wedding venue located in Apopka, Florida, just north of Orlando. We can help you piece it all together and lighten your load with our experience and due diligence. Take a look at our wedding packages below and then give us a call or contact us on our website for pricing. We can even tailor our existing wedding packages to fit your special occasion.
OUR PACKAGES
our
wedding packages
We’ve got you covered from top to bottom, taking care of every little detail so you can kick back, relax, and fully enjoy your big day. Explore our packages below  and get ready to experience the ultimate convenience with our all-inclusive options.
Simply Serene
Southern Elegance
A moment under the oaks
Simply Serene
6-hour rental of ceremony area under a live oak hammock, lakeside cocktail hour area, secret garden, our beautiful reception area with illuminated chandeliers and market lights. All under full AC with unique decor. Rental time begins when ceremony starts.
Seating and tables included for ceremony area and reception areas for up to 120 guests (Additional seating available if your party exceeds 120, minimum 50 guests and maximum guest count 200)
Mahogany Chivari chairs & 60” round tables (ability to upgrade to farm tables)
Access to multiple and air-conditioned restroom facilities
Use of outdoor fire pit and fireplace in front of reception hall
Ample Parking
1-hour rehearsal time prior to the wedding day
Several getting ready suites, “The Monroe Room” & “The Bunk House “(You may access suites 2 hrs. prior to ceremony, earlier access available as early as 11 am upon request at additional charge)
On-site CL staff to ensure the ultimate satisfaction and safety of your guests
DJ/entertainment services included from your choice of our selected DJ’s for 6 hours event time
Month of wedding planner/coordinator included for entire wedding day to make your special day as easy and stress-free as possible (1 lead & 1 assistant)
2 bartenders included (5 hours of bar time) to serve the alcohol (you bring your own alcohol, cups, mixers, garnishes, and cocktail napkins)
Galvanized metal tubs and bins for beverage and unlimited ice included
Catering services to include: 3 Butler passed appetizers during Cocktail hour, “Dinner Buffet set up/served” bread & butter, salad, 2 entrées, 2 starches, 1 vegetable, variety of linens, china plates, flatware, glassware for water and a drink station (ice tea, lemonade and water) for up to 120 guests
Champagne flutes (glasses) – complimentary pouring service (you bring your own Champagne)
Cake cutting – complimentary service
Catering tasting for up to 4 guests
6 highboy tables and any color of floor-length linens for cocktail hour
Antique Horse Carriage (used as prop)
Outdoor lawn games included
Two different sweetheart tables and two different chair options to select from
Floral package/allowance of $1,200
Market lights included in several areas
Cleaning fee included
Custom floor plan and creative design consultation included with additional decor rental options
Southern Elegance
Up to 12 hours on your event day; ceremony area under the live oak hammock, lakeside cocktail hour area, secret garden, our beautiful reception area with illuminated chandeliers with market lights under full AC, and uniquely decorated.
Several getting ready suites, “The Monroe Room”, “The Bunk House” & Lucky 13, the picture-perfect space with a pool table from as early as 11 am until ceremony.
Seating and tables included for ceremony and reception areas for up to 120 guests (Additional seating available if your party exceeds 120, minimum 50 guests and maximum guest count 200)
Mahogany Chivari chairs & 60” round tables (ability to upgrade to farm tables)
Access to multiple and air-conditioned restroom facilities
Use of outdoor fire pit and fireplace in front of reception hall
Ample Parking
1-hour rehearsal time prior to the wedding day
Access to venue for 2 hrs for engagement photos with your photographer during a weekday
On-site CL staff to ensure the ultimate satisfaction and safety of your guests
DJ/entertainment services included from your choice of our selected DJ’s for 6 hours of event time
Month of wedding planner/coordinator included for entire wedding day to make your special day as easy and stress-free as possible (1 lead & 1 assistant)
2 bartenders included (5 hours of bar time) to serve the alcohol (you bring your own alcohol, cups, mixers, garnishes, and cocktail napkins)
Galvanized metal tubs and bins for beverage and unlimited ice included
Catering services to include: 3 Butler passed appetizers during Cocktail hour, “Dinner Buffet set up/served” bread & butter, salad, 2 entrées, 2 starches, 1 vegetable, variety of linens, china plates, flatware, glassware for water and a drink station (ice tea, lemonade and water) for up to 120 guests
Champagne flutes (glasses) – complimentary pouring service (you bring your own Champagne)
Cake cutting – complimentary service
Catering tasting for up to 4 guests
6 highboy tables and any color of floor-length linens for cocktail hour
Antique Horse Carriage (used as prop)
Outdoor lawn games included
Two sweetheart tables and two different chair options to select from
Floral package/allowance of $1,200
Market lights included in several areas
Cleaning fee included
Custom floorplan and creative design consultation included with additional decor rental options
A moment under the oaks
INTIMATE ELOPEMENT PACKAGE
3 hr rental, includes (1) venue attendant
Ceremony under the live oak hammock
Lakeside cocktail area with covered Gazebo
Access to Bunk House for getting dressed with private restroom and AC
1 DJ for prelude, ceremony and cocktail hour music
Microphone for ceremony (couple provided officiant)
Premium Sparkling wine with orange juice or white wine
Champagne Glass Flutes
Displayed seasonal fruit platter
Mini Water bottles
4 cocktail table barrels
Ample Parking
Additional decor may be added for a fee
BASED ON 25 GUESTS
ADDITIONAL GUESTS MAY BE ADDED AT $25 EACH
MAX 35 GUESTS
AVAILABLE MONDAY-THURSDAYS 9:00 AM – 2:00 PM
ADDITIONAL DAYS AVAILABLE DURING SUMMER MONTHS
Download Simply Serene package
Download Southern elegance package
Download A Moment Under the Oaks package
our promise
to you
IT’S ALL ABOUT YOU
At Club Lake Venue, we are passionately committed to you, delivering unparalleled service for your special day. From the moment you arrive, our attentive staff will provide personalized support, ensuring you feel cherished and confident in your choice. Our experienced event planners will work closely with you to bring your unique vision to life, crafting a celebration that reflects your individual style. With meticulous attention to detail, we offer unique decor, exquisite floral arrangements, delectable catering, and flawless coordination. Your wedding day holds immense importance, and we are honored to be a part of it.
SCHEDULE A TOUR
our
vendors
Our vendors have earned and retained our business due to their consistency, knowledge of our facilities and process, and high quality.  We have negotiated very favorable terms and pricing resulting in excellent value for our packaged offerings.  Our caterers have been nominated best in Central Florida for the last ten years.
Complete vendor information given to you upon request of wedding package details.
inquire for details
special
EVENTS
Club Lake is your ultimate destination for hosting corporate and social events. Whether you’re planning a high-profile business gathering, a product launch, or a memorable celebration, our venue provides the perfect setting to bring your vision to life.
CONTACT US for more details
EXPLORE
Club Lake
GETTING READY SUITES
CEREMONY
RECEPTION
featured in
faq
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS —
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
When will my rehearsal be?
Your rehearsal will usually be scheduled the day before your wedding, the time will depend on the day. Typically rehearsals will be 9:00am-10:00am with an 8:30am decor and alcohol drop off, if we have a wedding that day. Otherwise, if we don’t have a wedding scheduled, your drop off and rehearsal can be scheduled anytime between 8:30am-4:00pm. You will schedule and confirm your drop off and rehearsal day and time with your wedding coordinator around 8 weeks before your wedding.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
Does your venue offer an ‘All Inclusive’ package?
Yes! View our packages for more information.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
What time can I get ready on wedding day?
Getting ready on property can be an easy and stress-free option for the day of your wedding, so we’ve provided you with some options! We have The Monroe Room, The Bunk House, and Lucky 13 available as early as 11:00am when you book the Southern Elegance package. Otherwise, with the Simply Serene package, you have The Monroe Room and The Bunk House available starting 2 hours prior to your ceremony.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
Is a wedding coordinator included?
Yes, we have an award-winning wedding planning company included in our wedding package that will provide month-of wedding coordination services for you.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
What is the minimum/maximum capacity?
50 minimum/200 guests + the couple maximum.
MORE FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
TESTIMONIALS
“@3x
Club Lake was an absolute dream of a venue. We wanted to get married out of Florida because we wanted an outdoor venue with a ceremony backdrop with beautiful trees, nature, etc and didn’t think we could find it near home. Boy were we wrong. Club Lake was the first and only place we visited. Both my husband and I fell in love with it instantly and knew it was the one! Natalie made the process so smooth and easy. They provide great options for a bride planning their own wedding and I couldn’t have been happier! It was a perfect day and let me tell you your wedding photos will be absolutely beautiful there. I am obsessed!”
-Megan M
READ MORE REVIEWS

faq
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS —
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
When will my rehearsal be?
Your rehearsal will usually be scheduled the day before your wedding, the time will depend on the day. Typically rehearsals will be 9:00am-10:00am with an 8:30am decor and alcohol drop off, if we have a wedding that day. Otherwise, if we don’t have a wedding scheduled, your drop off and rehearsal can be scheduled anytime between 8:30am-4:00pm. You will schedule and confirm your drop off and rehearsal day and time with your wedding coordinator around 8 weeks before your wedding.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
Does your venue offer an ‘All Inclusive’ package?
Yes! View our packages for more information.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
What time can I get ready on wedding day?
Getting ready on property can be an easy and stress-free option for the day of your wedding, so we’ve provided you with some options! We have The Monroe Room, The Bunk House, and Lucky 13 available as early as 11:00am when you book the Southern Elegance package. Otherwise, with the Simply Serene package, you have The Monroe Room and The Bunk House available starting 2 hours prior to your ceremony.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
Is a wedding coordinator included?
Yes, we have an award-winning wedding planning company included in our wedding package that will provide month-of wedding coordination services for you.
Group 2 Copy 3
Created with Sketch.
What is the minimum/maximum capacity?
50 minimum/200 guests + the couple maximum.

TESTIMONIALS
“@3x
Club Lake was an absolute dream of a venue. We wanted to get married out of Florida because we wanted an outdoor venue with a ceremony backdrop with beautiful trees, nature, etc and didn’t think we could find it near home. Boy were we wrong. Club Lake was the first and only place we visited. Both my husband and I fell in love with it instantly and knew it was the one! Natalie made the process so smooth and easy. They provide great options for a bride planning their own wedding and I couldn’t have been happier! It was a perfect day and let me tell you your wedding photos will be absolutely beautiful there. I am obsessed!”
-Megan M
